provisions.title: Section 3
provisions.content:
3. The occupier of any house or premises where any Ownerof
dog was kept, or permitted to live or remain at the time
of such injury shall be deemed to be the owner of such dog,
and shall be liable as such, unless the said occupier can
prove that he was not the owner of such dog at the time the
injury complained of was committed, and that such dog
was kept or permitted to live or remain in the said house
or premises without his sanction or knowledge:
  Provided always, that where there are more occupiers
than one in any house or premises let in separate apart-
ments, or lodgings, or otherwise, the occupier of that parti-
